info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:23PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Teller and northwestern El Paso Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 323 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm northwest of Palmer Lake, or 21 miles north of Colorado Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Monument around 340 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Air Force Academy and Gleneagle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for central and east central Colorado.
